price: 161. Toen hun broeder Loeth tegen hen zei: “Vrezen jullie Allah dan niet?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
